description:
Dayon meets another Dayon, and Iyami ponders is self-worth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shin`ya no Himatsuya 2 / Dayoon to Dayoon / Nayamu Iyami-san / Shin`ya no Himatsuya 3
